email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Mumbai
email_chain.body:
Dear Thomas,

We are pleased to offer mv SEA HORIZON for your 12,000 MT coal cargo ex Newcastle to Mumbai.
Rate: USD 42 per MT CFR basis.
Laycan: 20-25 November.
NYPE terms with demurrage USD 20,000/day.

Kind regards,
Laura Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Mumbai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for your offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Can you revise to USD 38 per MT?

Best regards,
Thomas Reed

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Mumbai
email_chain.body:
Dear Thomas,

After discussing with the owners, we can offer a revised rate of USD 40 per MT. This is our best and final offer.

Kind regards,
Laura Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Mumbai
email_chain.body:
Laura,

We can agree to USD 40 per MT. Please send the recap and confirm the laycan dates.

Best regards,
Thomas Reed

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Mumbai
email_chain.body:
Dear Thomas,

Thank you for your confirmation. Please find attached the recap for your review. Laycan remains 20-25 November.

Kind regards,
Laura Martinez
